entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Rosthern
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -17.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saskatoon Diefenbaker Int'l Airport 8:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -17.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -23.1°C
Wind: SE 23 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
